metadata.title: FTL: MULTIVERSE - FORGOTTEN GIBS ADDON
metadata.author: Gabriel Cooper
metadata.description:
PATCH AFTER FORGOTTEN RACES'S DATA FILE
This Forgotten Races addon adds Generated Gibs to the forgotten races ships.
Gibs were generated with the G.L.A.I.V.E. tool made by Epirasque
Works with Multiverse 5.4.X
